Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: Allow orderer startup with no channels defined
Issue.description: Today, if the orderer does not have any channels defined, it panics because it cannot find the system channel. This story is to remove those startup checks to allow the orderer to start successfully, even though it will not be in a position to accomplish anything. This should also block channel creation requests if no system channel is defined to route them to.
